emailtextde.label: EMailtext DE
emailtextde.comment:
Die folgenden Platzhalter sind verfügbar:
{$amount} - Buchungsbetrag
{$currency} - Buchungswährung
{$mandateRef} - Mandat Nr.
{$creditorId} - Gläubiger-Identifikationsnummer
{$iban} - IBAN
{$bic} - BIC
{$bankName} - Bank Name
{$payDateDE} - Fälligkeitstag DE
{$payDateEN} - Fälligkeitstag EN
{$payRecurSt} - Wiederholungs Status

emailtexten.label: EMailtext EN
emailtexten.comment:
The following placeholder are available:
{$amount} - Amount to book
{$currency} - Currency to book
{$mandateRef} - Mandate ID.
{$creditorId} - Creditor ID
{$iban} - IBAN
{$bic} - BIC
{$bankname} - Bank Name
{$payDateDE} - Due Date DE
{$payDateEN} - Due Date EN
{$payRecurSt} - Recurring Status
